title: Awesome List Updates on Feb 27, 2025

items.title: Awesome European Tech
items.content_text:
### Index / Translation services

*   [Supertext](https://www.supertext.com) (formerly TextShuttle) üá®üá≠ - AI-driven translation for businesses.
items.content_html:
Index / Translation services

  • Supertext (formerly TextShuttle) üá®üá≠ - AI-driven translation for businesses.

items.title: Awesome V
items.content_text:
### Build Systems

*   [vab (‚≠ê334)](https://github.com/vlang/vab) - The official V tool to build and package applications for Android.
*   [vab-sdl (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/larpon/vab-sdl) - Standalone and extra command for `vab` to build and package
    SDL2 and SDL3 based applications importing `vlang/sdl`.

### Audio

*   [miniaudio (‚≠ê53)](https://github.com/larpon/miniaudio) - Bindings for the excellent miniaudio C audio library.

### Game development

*   [chipmunk2d (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/larpon/chipmunk2d) - V wrapper of the Chipmunk2D physics library.
*   [wren (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/larpon/wren) - V wrapper around the excellent Wren scripting language.

### Graphics

*   [sdl (‚≠ê99)](https://github.com/vlang/sdl) - Official SDL2 & SDL3 bindings for V.
*   [sgldraw (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/larpon/sgldraw) - An experimental real-time vector render V module based on `sokol.sgl`.
*   [voronoi (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/larpon/voronoi) - V wrapper of [JCash/voronoi (‚≠ê686)](https://github.com/JCash/voronoi).
*   [vqoi (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/Le0Developer/vqoi) - V: QOI - The "Quite OK Image" format for fast, lossless image compression.

### Interoperability

*   [jni (‚≠ê28)](https://github.com/larpon/jni) - V wrapper around the C Java Native Interface (Desktop + Android).
items.content_html:
Build Systems

  • vab (‚≠ê334) - The official V tool to build and package applications for Android.
  • vab-sdl (‚≠ê4) - Standalone and extra command for vab to build and package SDL2 and SDL3 based applications importing vlang/sdl.

Audio

  • miniaudio (‚≠ê53) - Bindings for the excellent miniaudio C audio library.

Game development

  • chipmunk2d (‚≠ê3) - V wrapper of the Chipmunk2D physics library.
  • wren (‚≠ê7) - V wrapper around the excellent Wren scripting language.

Graphics

  • sdl (‚≠ê99) - Official SDL2 & SDL3 bindings for V.
  • sgldraw (‚≠ê10) - An experimental real-time vector render V module based on sokol.sgl.
  • voronoi (‚≠ê1) - V wrapper of JCash/voronoi (‚≠ê686).
  • vqoi (‚≠ê14) - V: QOI - The "Quite OK Image" format for fast, lossless image compression.

Interoperability

  • jni (‚≠ê28) - V wrapper around the C Java Native Interface (Desktop + Android).

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### Miscellaneous

*   [minja.hpp (‚≠ê157)](https://github.com/google/minja) - A minimalistic C++ Jinja templating engine for LLM chat templates. \[MIT]
items.content_html:
Miscellaneous

items.title: Awesome Embedded Rust
items.content_text:
### Real-time / Real-time Operating System (RTOS)

*   [Zephyr](https://docs.zephyrproject.org/latest/develop/languages/rust/index.html) An embedded RTOS, written in C, with support for writing applications in Rust.
items.content_html:
Real-time / Real-time Operating System (RTOS)

  • Zephyr An embedded RTOS, written in C, with support for writing applications in Rust.

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Python / Miscellaneous

*   [polars\_access\_mdbtools (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/DeflateAwning/polars_access_mdbtools) - Python package for reading tables from an Access database into Polars dataframes, using mdbtools by [@DeflateAwning](https://github.com/DeflateAwning).
items.content_html:
Python / Miscellaneous

  • polars_access_mdbtools (‚≠ê3) - Python package for reading tables from an Access database into Polars dataframes, using mdbtools by @DeflateAwning.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Productivity

*   [RightMenu Master](https://wangchujiang.com/rightmenu-master/) - An excellent Finder right-click menu enhancement tool to make your right-click menu more powerful. [![App Store](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-app-store.svg "App Store Software")](https://apps.apple.com/app/rightmenu-master/6737160756)
items.content_html:
Utilities / Productivity

  • RightMenu Master - An excellent Finder right-click menu enhancement tool to make your right-click menu more powerful.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Free / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-clean-architecture (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/carlossalasamper/angular-clean-architecture) - An Angular scaffold with a clean architecture that is easy to understand.

### DOM / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-gd (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/luisalejandrofigueredo/ng-gd) - An easy way to manage a canvas element with support for mouse or tablet events.

### File Upload / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-image-upload (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/osmanabdelsalam/ngx-image-upload) - A lightweight, customizable library for image uploads with preview, validation, and smooth animations. Supports Reactive Forms and `ngTemplate` for full flexibility.

### TypeScript / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [tsconfig (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/smartrecruiters/tsconfig) - SmartRecruiters‚Äô tsconfig contains all strict rules and improves your project type-safety.
items.content_html:
Free / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-clean-architecture (‚≠ê15) - An Angular scaffold with a clean architecture that is easy to understand.

DOM / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-gd (‚≠ê2) - An easy way to manage a canvas element with support for mouse or tablet events.

File Upload / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-image-upload (‚≠ê3) - A lightweight, customizable library for image uploads with preview, validation, and smooth animations. Supports Reactive Forms and ngTemplate for full flexibility.

TypeScript / Google Developer Experts

  • tsconfig (‚≠ê13) - SmartRecruiters‚Äô tsconfig contains all strict rules and improves your project type-safety.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Bars and Lines / Diagnostics

*   [neur1n/noline.nvim (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/neur1n/noline.nvim) - Fully customizable bars and lines components with no presets or constraints. See [construction (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/neur1n/dotfiles/tree/master/neovim/lua/plugconf/noline) and [setup (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/neur1n/dotfiles/blob/master/neovim/lua/plugconf/noline.lua) examples.
items.content_html:
Bars and Lines / Diagnostics

  • neur1n/noline.nvim (‚≠ê1) - Fully customizable bars and lines components with no presets or constraints. See construction (‚≠ê3) and setup (‚≠ê3) examples.
